articles.title: 50% of investors redeem their mutual fund investments within a year: AMFI data - MintGenie
articles.description: 50% of mutual fund investments in India get redeemed each year, raising doubts over the longevity of long-term investing; poor knowledge and jittery attitudes among investors partly contribute to this trend.
